text.textblock: Pursuant to the authority provided under section 302 of the Packers and Stockyards Act (7 U.S.C. 202), it was ascertained that the livestock markets named below are stockyards as defined by section 302(a). Notice was given to the stockyard owners and to the public as required by section 302(b), by posting notices at the stockyards on the dates specified below, that the stockyards are subject to the provisions of the Packers and Stockyards Act, 1921, as amended (7 U.S.C. 181
Done at Washington, DC this 24th day of January 1994.

table.textblock: 1Facility No., name, and location of stockyard
Bagley Livestock Exchange, Inc., Bagley, Minnesota
Tri County Marketing, Beulaville, North Carolina
Somerville Livestock Sales, Inc., Somerville, Tennessee

signjob.textblock: Director, Livestock Marketing Division, Packers and Stockyards Administration.
